name: An exquisite platinum ring with diamonds
data: It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It increases the users charisma impressively.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'offensive efficiency'.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users shadow resistance somewhat.
